verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. <S%H3884>If<s%> it had not been <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who was on our <S%H3478>side<s%>, Let Israel now <S%H559>say<s%>,
If <S%H3884><s%> it had not been <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who was on our <S%H120>side<s%>, When men rose up against <S%H6965>us<s%>;
Then <S%H233><s%> they had swallowed us <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>, When their <S%H639>wrath<s%> was kindled against <S%H2734>us<s%>;
Then <S%H233><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> had <S%H7857>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H5158>us<s%>, The stream had gone <S%H5674>over<s%> our <S%H5315>soul<s%>;
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Who hath not <S%H5414>given<s%> us as a <S%H2964>prey<s%> to their <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.

Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4422>escaped<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> out of the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3369>fowlers<s%>: The <S%H6341>snare<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and we are <S%H4422>escaped<s%>.
Our <S%H5828>help<s%> is in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>.
